TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SoapDuration extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides static methods for the serialization and deserialization of <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan"> to a string that is formatted as XSD `duration`.

remarks.format:
## Remarks For more information about XSD data types, see the "XML Data Types Reference" in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).
## Examples The following code example shows how to use the methods in the SoapDuration class to convert between a <xref:System.TimeSpan> object and an XSD `duration` string.
[!CODE [System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapDuration#10](../CodeSnippet/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapDuration#10)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed
.method public static hidebysig valuetype System.TimeSpan Parse(string value) cil managed

Docs.summary: Converts the specified <see cref="T:System.String"> into a <xref:System.TimeSpan> object.
Docs.returns: A <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan"> object that is obtained from .

remarks.format:
## Examples The following code example shows how to use the Parse method. This code example is part of a larger example that is provided for the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapDuration> class.
[!CODE [System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapDuration#11](../CodeSnippet/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapDuration#11)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig string ToString(valuetype System.TimeSpan timeSpan) cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns the specified <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan"> object as a <xref:System.String>.
Docs.returns: A <see cref="T:System.String"> representation of in the format "PxxYxxDTxxHxxMxx.xxxS" or "PxxYxxDTxxHxxMxxS". The "PxxYxxDTxxHxxMxx.xxxS" is used if <xref:System.TimeSpan.Milliseconds%2A?displayProperty=fullName> does not equal zero.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following code example shows how to use the ToString method. This code example is part of a larger example that is provided for the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapDuration> class.
[!CODE [System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapDuration#12](../CodeSnippet/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapDuration#12)]

Docs.summary: Gets the XML Schema definition language (XSD) of the current SOAP type.
Docs.value: A <see cref="T:System.String"> that indicates the XSD of the current SOAP type.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following code example shows how to use the XsdType property. This code example is part of a larger example that is provided for the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapDuration> class.
